name: Bob and Hop
description:
Its a mini game of Bobs pet Hop trying to save Bob while  hop shoots at the aliens and monster.

there's no point of finishing the game its a mini game .

and if you fail the game still counts those clicks again.

My first game and game jam project .

Music: https://mayragandra.itch.io/

sounds: https://gamesupply.itch.io/
